reviewText: If your a Dolphins fan then this is a must, you'll love it..., if your not, buy it anyway. It's amazing what you can achieve with the right mentor and the right students.
summary: To big a fan not to give it five stars
Title: N/A

reviewText: It is beyond inexcusable to have a ... "marketing department" ... so mired in today's modern NFL and blowing it, time after time, on these NFL DVD releases. They are horrible. Who is responsible for making these choices? There is so much good material to choose from and it's being ignored. Have you seen the "Greatest Games" between the Cowboys and Redskins set? Nothing from the 80s. Nothing from the 70s. It's all mid to late 90s forward.WHAT?Give us what we want. The classic games we grew up with. The classic NFL Films we grew up with.
summary: NFL marketing staff needs to be fired .
Title: N/A

reviewText: well done. this 2 disc set covers the history of the miami dolphins very well.color and sound quality are fantastic. extra -the longests game '72 playoff vs.chiefs and 1983 first game of dan marino are superb.

reviewText: I am a life long Dolphin fan even though we did so horribly these past years... This is my opportunity to enjoy our past accomplishments while waiting for a bright and new future... GO FINS !!! Oh, yeah.. Price was good and shipping was quick. I would recommend this Seller

reviewText: I liked it. But I think that the dvd should have covered the fractious relationship that Jimmy and Dan Marino had at the end of their respective careers. Also they left out their 1998-2001 playoff flameouts, and this should have been covered a bit.For the special features, they have marino's first win, longest day, super bowl 8, Zach Thomas retirement ceremony, and most importantly, Americas game: 1972 dolphins.
Title: N/A
